arabicText: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًۭا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Till	the	time	when	they	will	see	what	they	are	promised	-	so	they	will	now	come	to	know	whose	
aide	is	weak,	and	who	is	lesser	in	number.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	dekheiñ	ge	jo	w’ada	diya	jāta	hai	to	ab	jān	jāyeñ	ge	ke	kis	ka	madad-gār	kamzor	
aur	kis	ki	ginti	kam

arabicText: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌۭ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“I	do	not	know	whether	what	
you	are	promised	is	close	or	if	my	Lord	will	postpone	it	for	a	while.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	maiñ	nahi	jānta	āaya	nazdeek	hai	woh	jiska	tumheiñ	w’ada	diya	jāta	hai	ya	mera	Rab	
usey	kuchh	waqfā	dega

arabicText: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
englishTranslationText: The	All	Knowing	of	all	the	hidden	does	not	give	anyone	the	control	over	His	secrets.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ghaib	ka	jānne	wāla	to	apne	ghaib	par	kisi	ko	musallat	nahi	karta

arabicText: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍۢ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Except	to	His	chosen	Noble	Messengers	–	so	He	appoints	guards	in	front	and	behind	him.	(Allah	
gave	the	knowledge	of	the	hidden	to	the	Holy	Prophet	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him.)
romanUrduTranslationText: Siwāye	apne	pasandida	Rasooloñ	ke	ke	unke	āage	peechhe	paihra	muqarrar	kar	deta	hai

arabicText: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
englishTranslationText:
In	order	to	see	that	they	have	conveyed	the	messages	of	their	Lord	–	and	His	knowledge	
encompasses	all	whatever	they	have,	and	He	has	kept	all	things	accounted	for.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tākay	dekh	le	ke	unhoñ	ne	apne	Rab	ke	payām	pahuñcha	diye	aur	jo	kuch	unke	pās	sab	uske	Ílm	
meiñ	hai	aur	usne	har	cheez	ki	ginti	shumār	kar	rakhi	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
englishTranslationText:
O	the	One	Wrapped	in	piety!	(Prophet	
Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	jhurmat	mārne	wāle!

arabicText: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Stand	up	for	worship	during	the	night,	
except	for	some	part	of	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tāt	meiñ	qiyām	farma	siwa	kuchh	rāt	ke

arabicText: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
englishTranslationText: For	half	the	night,	or	reduce	some	from	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Āadhi	rāt	ya	is	se	kuchh	kam	karo

arabicText: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Or	increase	a	little	upon	it,	and	recite	the	
Qur’an	slowly	in	stages.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	is	par	kuchh	badhāo	aur	Qur’ān	khoob	
thaher	thaher	kar	padho

arabicText: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًۭا ثَقِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	We	shall	soon	ordain	a	heavy	
responsibility	upon	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	‘an-qareeb	ham	tum	par	ek	bhāri	
bāt	dāleñ	ge

arabicText: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًۭٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	getting	up	in	the	night	is	tougher,	
and	the	words	flow	with	strength.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	rāt	ka	uthna	woh	ziyada	dabāo	
dālta	hai	aur	bāt	khoob	seedhi	nikalti	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًۭا طَوِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	you	have	a	lot	of	matters	during	the	
day.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	din	meiñ	to	tum	ko	bahut	se	kām	
haiñ

arabicText: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	the	name	of	your	Lord	and,	
leaving	others,	devote	yourself	solely	to	
Him.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apne	Rab	ka	nām	yād	karo

arabicText: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Lord	of	the	East	and	Lord	of	the	West	-	
there	is	no	God	except	Him,	therefore	
make	Him	your	sole	Trustee	of	affairs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	sab	se	toot	kar	usi	ke	ho	raho	woh	
poorab	ka	Rab	aur	pachchhim	ka	Rab	uske	
siwa	koi	ma'bood	nahi	to	tum	usi	ko	apna	
kār-sāz	banāo

arabicText: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًۭا جَمِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	patiently	endure	upon	what	the	
disbelievers	say,	and	leave	them	for	good.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfiroñ		ki	bātoñ	par	sabr	farmāo	aur	
unheiñ	achchhi	tarah	chhod	do

arabicText: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
englishTranslationText: And	leave	them	to	Me	–	these	wealthy	deniers	–	and	give	them	some	respite.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	mujh	par	chhodo	un	jhutlāne	wāle	
māl-dāron	ko	aur	unheiñ	thodi	mohlat	do

arabicText: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًۭا وَجَحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText: Indeed	We	have	heavy	fetters	and	a	blazing	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	hamāre	pās	bhāri	bediyañ	haiñ	
aur	bhadakti	āag.

arabicText: وَطَعَامًۭا ذَا غُصَّةٍۢ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText: And	food	that	chokes,	and	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	gale	meiñ	phañsta	khāna	aur	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	.

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًۭا مَّهِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
On	a	day	when	the	earth	and	the	mountains	will	tremble,	and	the	mountains	turn	into	dunes	of	
flowing	sand.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	thar-tharayeñge	zameen	aur	pahād	aur	pahād	ho	jāyeñ	ge	rete	ka	teela	behta	huwa.

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًۭا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًۭا
englishTranslationText:
We	have	indeed	sent	a	Noble	Messenger	towards	you,	a	present	witness	over	you	–	the	way	We	
had	sent	a	Noble	Messenger	towards	Firaun.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		ham	ne	tumhāri	taraf	ek	Rasool	bheja	ke	tum	par	hāzir	nāzir	haiñ	jaise	ham	ne	fir'aun	
ki	taraf	Rasool	bheje.

arabicText: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًۭا وَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText: In	response	Firaun	disobeyed	the	Noble	Messenger,	so	We	seized	him	with	a	severe	seizure.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	fir'aun	ne	us	Rasool	ka	ḥukm		na	māna	to	ham	ne	usey	sakht	giraft	se	pakda.

arabicText: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًۭا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
englishTranslationText: So	how	will	you	save	yourselves,	if	you	disbelieve,	on	a	day	that	will	turn	children	old?
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	kaise	bachoge	agar	kufr	karo	us	din	se	jo	bachchoñ	ko	boodha	kar	dega

arabicText: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا ١٨
englishTranslationText: The	heaven	will	split	asunder	with	its	grief;	the	promise	of	Allah	will	surely	occur.
romanUrduTranslationText: Āasmān	uske	sadme	se	phat	jāyega	Allah	ka	w’ada	hokar	rehna.

arabicText: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
englishTranslationText: This	is	indeed	an	advice;	so	whoever	wishes	may	take	the	path	towards	his	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak		yeh	nasihat	hai	to	jo	chāhe	apne	Rab	ki	taraf	rāh	le

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًۭا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًۭا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	your	Lord	knows	that	you	stand	up	
in	prayer,	sometimes	almost	two-thirds	of	
the	night,	and	sometimes	half	the	night	or	
sometimes	a	third	of	it	–	and	also	a	group	
of	those	along	with	you;	Allah	keeps	
measure	of	the	night	and	day;	He	knows	
that	you,	O	Muslims,	will	not	be	able	to	
measure	the	night,	so	He	has	inclined	
towards	you	with	mercy	–	therefore	recite	
from	the	Qur’an	as	much	as	is	easy	for	you;	
He	knows	that	soon	some	of	you	will	fall	ill,	
and	some	will	travel	in	the	land	seeking	the	
munificence	of	Allah,	and	some	will	be	
fighting	in	Allah’s	cause;	therefore	recite	
from	the	Qur’an	as	much	as	is	easy	for	you,	
and	establish	prayer	and	pay	the	
obligatory	charity,	and	lend	an	excellent	
loan	to	Allah;	and	whatever	good	you	send	
ahead	for	yourselves,	you	will	find	it	with	
Allah,	better	and	having	a	great	reward;	
and	seek	forgiveness	from	Allah;	indeed	
Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	tumhāra	Rab	jānta	hai	ke	tum	
qiyām	karte	ho	kabhi	do	tehāyi	rāt	ke	
qareeb	kabhi	āadhi	rāt	kabhi	tehāyi	aur	ek	
jamā’at	tumhāre	sāth	wāli	aur	Allah	rāt	aur	
din	ka	andāza	farmāta	hai	usey	m’aloom	
hai	ke	aey	Musalmano	tum	se	rāt	ka	
shumār	na	ho	sakega	to	usne	apni	mehar	
se	tum	par	ruju’	farmayi	ab	Qur’ān	meiñ	se	
jitna	tum	par	āasān	ho	utna	padho	usey	
m’aloom	hai	ke	‘an-qareeb	kuch	tum	meiñ	
bimār	hoñge	aur	kuch	zameen	meiñ	safar	
kareñge	Allah	ka	fazl	talash	karne	aur	kuch	
Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladte	hoñge	to	jitna	
Qur’ān	mayassar	ho	padho	aur	Namāz	
qāim	rakho	aur	Zakāt	do	aur	Allah	ko	
achcha	qarz	do	aur	apne	liye	jo	bhalāyi	
āage	bhejoge	usey	Allah	ke	pās	behtar	aur	
bade	sawāb	ki	pāo	ge	aur	Allah	se	
bakhshish	māñgo	be-shak		Allah	bakhsh	ne	
wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
englishTranslationText: O	the	Cloaked	One!	(Prophet	Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	h
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	bālā	posh	ordhne	wāle!

arabicText: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
englishTranslationText: Rise	up	and	warn!
romanUrduTranslationText: Khade	ho	jāo	phir	dar	sunao

arabicText: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
englishTranslationText: And	proclaim	the	Purity	of	your	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apne	Rab	hi	ki	badāyi	bolo

arabicText: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
englishTranslationText: And	keep	your	clothes	clean.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apne	kapde	pāk	rakho

arabicText: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
englishTranslationText: And	stay	away	from	idols.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	butoñ	se	door	raho

arabicText: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
englishTranslationText: And	do	not	favour	others	in	order	to	receive	more.		.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	ziyada	lene	ki	niyyat	se	kisi	par	ehsān	na	karo

arabicText: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
englishTranslationText: And	for	the	sake	of	your	Lord,	patiently	endure.		.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	apne	Rab	ke	liye	sabr	kiye	raho

arabicText: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
englishTranslationText: So	when	the	Trumpet	will	be	blown.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	jab	soor	phooñka	jāyega.

arabicText: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
englishTranslationText: So	that	is	a	tough	day.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	woh	din	karra	(Sakht)	din	hai.

arabicText: عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText: Not	easy	upon	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Kāfiroñ	par	āasān	nahi

arabicText: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText: Leave	him	to	Me,	the	one	whom	I	created	single.
romanUrduTranslationText: Usey	mujh	par	chhod	jise	maiñ	ne	akela	paida	kiya

arabicText: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًۭا مَّمْدُودًۭا
englishTranslationText: And	gave	him	vast	wealth.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	usey	wasee'	māl	diya

arabicText: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًۭا
englishTranslationText: And	gave	him	sons	present	before	him.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	bete	diye	sāmne	hāzir	rehte
